    • Uses of Line2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry

      Classes in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry that implement Line2DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Line2D
      Represents an infinitely-long 2D line defined by a 2D point and a 2D unit-vector.
      Constructors in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry with parameters of type Line2DReadOnly 
      Constructor Description
      Line2D​(Line2DReadOnly other)
      Creates a new line 2D and initializes it to other.
      Line3D​(Line2DReadOnly line2DReadOnly)
      Creates a new line 3D and initializes it to other.

      default boolean Line2DReadOnly.areLinesPerpendicular​(Line2DReadOnly other)
      Tests if this line and the other line are perpendicular.
      default boolean Line2DReadOnly.epsilonEquals​(Line2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Tests on a per-component basis on the point and vector if this line is equal to other with the tolerance epsilon.
      default boolean Line2DReadOnly.equals​(Line2DReadOnly other)
      Tests on a per component basis, if this line 2D is exactly equal to other.
      default boolean Line2DReadOnly.geometricallyEquals​(Line2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Compares this to other to determine if the two lines are geometrically similar.

      Computes the coordinates of the closest point to the ray that belongs to this convex polygon.

      Classes in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame that implement Line2DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FrameLine2D
      FrameLine2D is a 2D line expressed in a given reference frame.
      Constructors in us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame with parameters of type Line2DReadOnly 
      Constructor Description
      FrameLine2D​(Line2DReadOnly line2DReadOnly)
      Creates a new line, initializes its point and direction from the given line and its reference frame to ReferenceFrame.getWorldFrame().
      FrameLine2D​(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame, Line2DReadOnly line2DReadOnly)
      Creates a new line, initializes its point and direction from the given line and its reference frame to referenceFrame.
      FrameLine3D​(Line2DReadOnly line2DReadOnly)
      Creates a new line, initializes its point and direction from the given line and its reference frame to ReferenceFrame.getWorldFrame().
      FrameLine3D​(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame, Line2DReadOnly line2DReadOnly)
      Creates a new line, initializes its point and direction from the given line and its reference frame to referenceFrame.
